message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's a great deal and I think you'll find it really useful.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $105 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $110.  Let's find a middle ground here.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $110, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $108?
Bob, I'm trying to be fair here. I'm willing to come down a little more to $109, but I can't go any lower.  Let's make this deal happen.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to stretch my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $107?
